about_the_game:
Every tedious situation inevitably leads to the birth of an unstoppable problem solver. Are you gonna be the one?

If your answer is yes, don’t forget. In this test of wit, teamwork and quick thinking, there’s no end to challenges.

A home we need, a home we build. Decorate every inch of your base with various furnitures, expressive art pieces and many electronic devices that goes “Bzzzzt!”. 

Devices you built will come to your aid in your adventures in countless universes. Develop equipments, upgrade them and decide which ones you’ll bring them your next quest. I’ll say that one time. Choose wisely.

Show your hardwork in your trophy section. Everyone needs to be aware of your unrivalled achievements. You can even adopt a pet when you earn enough experience points. Wouldn’t it be great if you have a pet cat? Or a pet mouse? Or a pet… xenomorph?

From cosmic catastrophes to underwater disasters, insert every mission into their limits. Will you accept the challenge?

Brave a deadly meteor shower to retrieve valuable cargo from a space station.

Evacuate a rapidly sinking submarine and save the crew before time runs out.

Two trains on the way crashing into each other. No way to save every person? Just find one!

 And More:

Every level brings fresh thrills and unforgettable challenges to prove your brilliance.

There is no place for solo workers in “Problem Solved”. Every player has a crucial role to play in each 'engineeral' problem. You’ll rise together or you’ll fall together.

That’s why communication is the key to success. Use your radio as much as possible to direct your teammate’s actions and give the necessary intel at the right time. But don’t forget! You must use the radio station for it. No one can hear your screams if you’re away from the station.

Variety is the name of the meal. Adrenaline is the side dish and unlimited rage is the desert. Do you believe your friends will be stay by your side after your first adventure? Do you think you have the courage to say “Let’s do one more?”. Well. Let’s find our, shall we?

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 8900K
  • Memory: 16000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

  • OS: Window 11
